website_summaries.verdict: Great price point for punch mitts. Lightweight materials  keep your arm muscles feeling fresh.
pros: Nice level of padding on both the palm and the wrist to keep your hands protected during sparring sessions
Slight curvature in the punching mitts will mimic that of your hand, ensuring a comfortable fit
Foam padding is a little stiffer than some others, which results in a longer-lasting mitt
cons: Not made to meet the needs of advanced fighters

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: As other people commented, these have a STRONG chemical smell to them when you first get them. But for the price, they work well (after you air them out for a couple days). My 4th grade daughter is going for her black belt in Kung Fu, and she's also in sparring competitions. We tested these out with her sparring gloves, and they work great. They fit me fine, and they even protect me from her biggest punches (and she's a tough kid!). She thought the logo/design was really cool too, goes with the theme of her other Kung Fu gear, which is Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Not much padding
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. They are very light weight with minimal padding. They do the job, but any heavy/powerful hits from a partner will hurt your hands. Also, these are made for smaller hands. I have to take my wraps off in order for them to fit and it's still very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, primarily for amateur boxers/kickboxers who do this for exercise purposes. Lightweight. They fit well. They're well-padded. Shipping was fast and efficient. I couldn't be happier all around with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these mitts for my 7 year old that has started taking Tae Kwon Do so he can practice at home. They fit a wide size of hands; I have very small hands but my husband has large hands and they fit us both comfortably. The foam is a bit stiffer then I thought it would be but overall very well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Nice mitts for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice full coverage punch mitts made by the Wolon Company in China. Was very impressed when I received these, they are made from quality synthetic materials and are properly stitched together. I'm sure they will last a long time and for the price they can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzie

customer_reviews.title: Great and perfect for either hand
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old has taken a shine to karate and boxing. Luckily, so did my 8 year old. Figuring it's a good exercise, I got involved. These are perfect for all sizes of hands, and give a nice firm, but not hard surface to contact. You obviously can't hit it hard when a kid holds it, but you can spar prwtty well with it
customer_reviews.author: Viraga

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like one hand clapping when smashed together
customer_reviews.text: Light and firm, as if the cushioning is made out of Styrofoam, good for practicing with elementary school martial arts students.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher N. DiNardo

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice target pads.... solid, very durable, and light weight! It's a great workout for my gf and I, when we're not at our Extreme Kick-boxing class. We have a lot of fun with these; we spar, then switch off, and repeat - a great way to get sweaty and have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great price, perfect condition, amazing quality.
customer_reviews.text: -These arrived in 3 days, and they are brand new. -They are perfect for sparring because the foam material is a little more stiff than average foam which makes the punch bounce off a little more. -I have big hands and there is still a little wiggle room, and you can wear them on either hand, so they can fit everyone. For the price these are a steal. I highly recommend them to all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Coy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is cheap, but serves its purpose very well. I bought these for me and my daughter's use. My 5 year old even was excited to see and use it. We both take MMA classes so I bought these to help us practice. Its lighter and thinner than the ones we use in school, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Luchi

customer_reviews.title: good material but small... only for kids.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice pair of target, however, they are small. I have small hands and they fit tight. These are good for kids not for adults. I bought these to train my 9yrs old son.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We use these in taekwondo, and I figured we would need our own when we go back to class. I love how they fit on your hands, and they don’t feel clunky. They are very easy to maneuver your hands quickly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schaffrath

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and have held up
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these 2 times a week for the last year or so at my Muay Thai gym. Works perfect, they're a little small but for the price totally worth it. They can feel a little weird on because all the finger depths are the same
customer_reviews.author: Cameron C

customer_reviews.title: Durability and materials
customer_reviews.text: Quality is durable when taking impact. Haven't broke them in fully to measure out it's longevity over time, but they will get the job done for practice. Thnks 👍
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H

customer_reviews.title: Maaannn these are the ones!
customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome and look really cool. I bought these for a co- worker and I just might buy myself some to workout with. Like the way it’s fits, just like a glove that clings to your hand no need to worry about fixing them from slipping off like traditional ones. I would highly recommend buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Working good, but evident cheap price point
customer_reviews.text: They seem cheaply made, but so far work and look great. Stitching is noticeable, loose fabric is evident.. etc... But holding together thus far, work great for the karate class I teach. :) Cushion is "firm" which is good by me. They are not plush or soft. They are made for harder hits.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Super light
customer_reviews.text: These are very light weight and well padded. They're fantastic training mitts and they don't seem to be breaking down even after a year of decent use.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the price. Not terribly durable perfect for kids. Or for patient rehabilitation, not ideal for serious training. Update: Excellent and amazing customer service! I was offered a full refund after the seller read my initial review. Will definitely do business with them again!
customer_reviews.author: gene liang

customer_reviews.title: You See What You Get
customer_reviews.text: Got it to train my kids. They don't pack a punch so not sure how well padded but works for my purpose. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Richard Soh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Training Tools
customer_reviews.text: Tested them out right away with my pops. Fits his hands well and it adjusts a decent amount. Nice padding and it feels good to hit it even with a bare hand. Can't wait to use them in training. Very Great price and an excellent product. Glad i found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cushioning can be customized
customer_reviews.text: Got these to teach my kid some fighting skills. The pads are for adults so they were too hard for 2 year old hands. I unlaced them, swapped two layers of carpet padding for the hard foam, then laced them up again. Great customizeable product.
customer_reviews.author: shinyhalo

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price, gonna get more!
customer_reviews.text: Use to train my neighbors two kids. They are little wild so having the grips nice and tight is great.
customer_reviews.author: CPF

customer_reviews.title: and work great for training with
customer_reviews.text: They came way quicker then expected, and work great for training with. I'm teaching my nephew and they fit perfectly for maneuvering and hold up well. I definitely suggest these to anyone who is wanting to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described and fit my hands nicely. Absorb impact very well and light enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: As described and fit my hands nicely. Absorb impact very well and light enough to not get worn down while holding mitts.
customer_reviews.author: Wholezy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Suprisingly good quality for the price. It doesnt feel like the professional stuff but pretty close and definitely very good for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the price but I really got what a paid for. It feels a little cheap, however it gets the job done during training
customer_reviews.author: GMelanie

customer_reviews.title: 16 Dollar Everlast killer?
customer_reviews.text: These are high grade for the cost. Currently in great condition after moderate use. Great for kicks and knees, best thing is that they are reversable so you can't put them on the wrong hand. This is great for adults and teens. Happy with my new product, everlast would have charged twice this amount for the quality presented.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Kryns

customer_reviews.title: great pad and mitt
customer_reviews.text: kids love playing with them. can take kicks and punches with out hurting. great for practice with adults even.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really bad quality. Bought it for my sister (age 14, weights 92 pounds) and she broke it immediately...
customer_reviews.author: Dan GDL

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time and as advertised. Feels well constructed and fits well,so far so good. Excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: AK Young

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The size is smaller than I expected, but they are well padded and can take both punches and kicks. Might be a little to solid for kids. Works great for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Daniyar Salikhov

customer_reviews.title: good quality at a low price
customer_reviews.text: My kids have fun with these and the gloves the got. They work, are well made and low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Mannas

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all. Dad teaching kids boxing.
customer_reviews.text: I use these pads for my kids to learn how to box. I’m 30 and they fit my hands snuff. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis P.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I bought them for my 7 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought them for my 7 year old to burn off extra energy and they seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Swasey

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: We bought these together with theand our 5 year old daughter is enjoying her jab-jab-cross sessions. This is a very good quality product, at least for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for practicing with the kids after Karate and Muay ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for practicing with the kids after Karate and Muay Thia, worth the investment for keeping the kids on track when they aren't at the dojo
customer_reviews.author: TasK211

customer_reviews.title: Great quality !
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!! Used daily for a month now and love them..
customer_reviews.author: Tonibugg

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Only received on piece not a pair as described. Will return. NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Cathey1974

customer_reviews.title: they are as good as any of the lower end stuff from the ...
customer_reviews.text: These were an exceptional find. They were for my three year old, and I didn't really have high expectations because of the low price. I'll say hands down, they are as good as any of the lower end stuff from the bigger brands (Century, Everlast) that costs 2.5 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Reid D Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this item to start boxing training with my son and it has not Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ceas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not a big fan of the insert in there. too much to work with
customer_reviews.author: David & Ginida Rispress

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: You will be surprised at how durable and the high quality of this item.
customer_reviews.author: SME

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My son is just getting start with Taekwondo. These are great value mitts to practice with. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Charles M Odden

customer_reviews.title: Had it for awhile now and it’s holdng up really good
customer_reviews.text: High quality stuff. Had it for awhile now and it’s holdng up really good
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and have nothing but good experiences from using this for training! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Botero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who does karate. The are made well and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: AAM

customer_reviews.title: They are fine
customer_reviews.text: Not the softest padding. Its is soft enough. My 9yr old son loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boxing training hand guards fit perfectly. The material seems durable. Perfectly padded for my protection. Product exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: derrick parker

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: PROTECTS THE HAND AND WRIST LIKE A PROFESSIONAL HAND WRAPPER WOULD! FOR THE YOUNG BOXER (KID OR TEENAGER)
customer_reviews.author: DREAMWORLD

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It has helped him get better in his karate.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah S.

customer_reviews.title: Great mitts for small price
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty legit mitts for such a low price... They have served me well and fit nicely on each hand. Could use some better designing around the hand compartment. Good over all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good workout
customer_reviews.text: my buddy and I use these when we work out and they're great. it's a lot cheaper than paying our boxing gym memberships
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I practice with this and me and my kids love its
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Very good feeling when wearing these
customer_reviews.text: Very good feeling when wearing these. Seems good quality ! The mitts are asymmetric and well adapt for each hand. Happy with that purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Antony

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Compares to $60+ products.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mitts. Same quality as the higher priced mitts found on MMA websites. Have been training for over 10 years and these mitts work well from skill levels ranging from begginer your pro. You will not be disappointed. Also fits my XL hands which I find hard to come by.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to train my 8yo, and they work well for our purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great price. I haven't used them much but you can tell they will last for the price you paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for teaching my son to box. Many uses and have barely even worn.
customer_reviews.author: Raul D

customer_reviews.title: Great for children!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set for kids! Teaching my kids how to box and learn some kick boxing. For the price and my kids' ages, it should last awhile. Don't see this lasting if used for adults though.
customer_reviews.author: Scott07

customer_reviews.title: Hit me!
customer_reviews.text: Great hands targets. These fit hands well and take a beating. Not too hard, not too soft.
customer_reviews.author: TerryTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Takes a pounding
customer_reviews.text: These things take a pounding, literally. So far very little signs of wear. Although I wouldn't say my wife and I are as brutal on them as some users would be.
customer_reviews.author: Pocchange

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for training with my 5 year old. Good fit for mom and dad to wear!
customer_reviews.author: winskel

customer_reviews.title: Cheerwing Mitts
customer_reviews.text: Great boxing/kickboxing mitts I used them previously and they were exceptional quality and felt like they are great for the cost of only roughly $17
customer_reviews.author: Klearko Kajmak

customer_reviews.title: Great for workout.
customer_reviews.text: Great pads. A bit hard at the beginning but I got used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Saioa

customer_reviews.title: Great mitts.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome training mitts, provides more flexibility with a variety of strikes and styles.
customer_reviews.author: Panther

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them often, but they seem sturdy. Firm, with just a little give.
customer_reviews.author: NewBeginning10

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product and has held up well so far! The quality at this price point is quite good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price. So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Good option in lieu of the full pads
customer_reviews.author: Christine B

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast! My green belt was so excited to get these!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Rudnicki

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its ok but not meant for intense training. mostly for kids and teenagers
customer_reviews.author: Kyra B.

customer_reviews.title: Shipped on time.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and outstanding product I will definitely recommend this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: With Amazon Prime they came in less than two days ...
customer_reviews.text: With Amazon Prime they came in less than two days and I look forward to training with them. The quality is LEGIT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Felix D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit and well made
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty solid for what you pay. Fit well and seem like they will wear well.
customer_reviews.author: mimmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the money. Fairly stiff but functional.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt sure what to expect. But I enjoy using this produce.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Lewis

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Been using them for our combatives practice
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Been using them for our combatives practice. Had them for 3 weeks. No problems. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Peel

customer_reviews.title: NIce and snappy
customer_reviews.text: NIce and snappy! love em. I love the POP sound personally. The curve on the bottom is helpful for uppercuts and hooks. They fit very well too
customer_reviews.author: Blade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good bang for the buck. Light but they stand so to pretty good to hard punches.
customer_reviews.author: Jaison

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Used them for quite awhile now. Very durable mitts. Can take endless punches.
customer_reviews.author: Thoroughtheexec

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product I use it almost everyday I did love ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product I use it almost everyday I did love the price. I use it for my boxing training and I use it with my girls MMA training and they're holding up great . I definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gloves
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter to use at boxing class. She loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good material having fun with my 4 year old boy.
customer_reviews.author: fernando

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE ABSOLUTELY PERFECT FOR TRAINING AND KICKING TOO!! 💪💪💪💪💯💯💯✔✔
customer_reviews.author: Saudia Ali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great service even got before the date of delivery..quality of the mitts are good...I love my mitts..
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fair Pads
customer_reviews.text: Bought the mantis style gloves and they met our needs. Needed an inexpensive pair and fast. They have a rounded palm grip with finger grips to help grasping. Padding is thick and substantial. After the third use one began to show cracking along the logo but we do extensive training and workouts. Decent quality for the price though so no big complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Taborri

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: The only bad (?) thing to say is how hard they are, but if you're not like me and didn't punch trees or bareknuckle punching bags your whole life, you should be wearing gloves anyway lol. My 7 year old daughter has been getting drilled with these and I love them for the price. If you're putting in a lot of work, maybe consider something softer and more durable but these do the trick for us.
customer_reviews.author: Wes1216

customer_reviews.title: GREAT pads for the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect punching pads, great value. The hardest punch is less painful than catching a baseball in the palm for sure, so I don't know what these critics are saying. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: They fit my large hands just fine.
customer_reviews.text: They fit my large hands just fine. I use them for practice with my son and they are great so far, we've had them about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Target area is fine, good padding
customer_reviews.text: Do the job. Seems well made. Rubber/vinyl/leather. Not for someone with big hands, they are small. Target area is fine, good padding.
customer_reviews.author: Roben

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Definitely recommend. I use it for cardio with my wife. It works great

customer_reviews.title: Very little padding
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit comfortable, however the mits is very hard on my 9 year olds fists when he punches. Fortunately I have some padded gloves for him to wear.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help train my daughter. They are too hard and I will be returning them.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are an exceptional value for the money! These are just as nice as my Venums, but a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hallman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Let's me help my son practice his striking.

product_meta.title: Cheerwing Boxing MMA Punching Mitts Focus Pads
feature_bullets: Durable & Long Lasting: Made of high-quality durable PU leather material, these punch mitts are easy to maintain and clean.
Effective Protection: High potency foam padding with inner palm ball well protect palm, wrist and reduces force of heavy impact.
Ergonomic Curved Punching Mitts: The pre-curved concave technology offers you a superior striking surface every time and make it comfortable to hold.
Design for Training: This focus mitt is designed especially for the daily focus training of MMA, UFC, Kickboxing, Karate, Muay Thai, Sparring.
Dimensions: 22 x 18 x 3cm/8.66 x 7.09 x 1.18inch; Weight: about 200g / 7.05oz
